function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perception of urban green spaces shifted during the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to changes in visitor behavior and usage.","Impact":"Changes in the perception of urban green spaces may lead to overcrowding, inadequate social distancing, and increased risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns about the importance of social distancing in UGS, implementing access restrictions, and promoting alternative outdoor spaces.","Technologies":"Geolocation tools for crowd monitoring, mobile applications for reserving time slots in UGS, and digital communication channels for dissemination of guidelines.","People":"Visitors to urban green spaces, residents in high-density areas, and communities reliant on UGS for outdoor activities.","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities, urban planners, and community organizations."}]}
